creator: liangyifang@foxmail.com
text: if i have a number 350102196912300000 in a xlsx's numeric cell. when i use the method "XSSFCell.getNumericCellValue()", it returns 350102196912300030, but not 350102196912300000 !!!  I use the poi-bin-3.10.1-20140818.zip. jdk1.7.0_15
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/poi-user/201406.mbox/%3C538C6634.6070405@corefiling.co.uk%3E may be relevant, especially the linked Microsoft documentation.
creator: dtn-asfbugs@corefiling.co.uk
liangyifang@foxmail.com
text:
yes, u r right. i found the xml content is "<v>3.5010219691230003E+17</v>".

Thanks.
